name: NOT ALONE: Kill'em all!
description:
Welcome to NOT ALONE: Kill'em all!

This game is a nervous and colorful beat them all.

You play as the savior of the planet.

Your mission is simple: prevent the destruction of the planet Earth by any means necessary.

Between two victorious battles you will have the possibility to improve your ship. Its defense system, its weapons. 

You will not be able to take everything, you will have to make a choice. 

Here we think that every man has the right to choose how to destroy the invader!

NOT ALONE: Kill'em all is brought to you by Vercin Games with the precious artistic advice of Nokhyrr. 

Game developed for the Brackeys game jam 2022. It is not excluded that content is added if you liked the game experience.

Feel free to share your scores in the comments!

Enjoy the game!
